channel.title: Azure Active Directory on This Is My Demo
channel.description: Recent content in Azure Active Directory on This Is My Demo

item.title: Dipping My Big Toe Into Cross-Tenant Synchronization Part I
item.description: So, I am very interested in What cross-tenant synchronization is and what it could do for me and maybe for customers? Since I have a number of tenants I thought it would be good to at least try this preview feature and blog about my experience. Also, this blog originally started out as a single blog but as I started to write it it grew and grew and grew. I wanted to refocus myself and break it up into smaller parts.
